column1: :''The main article for this subject is located at '''[[Théoden]]'''.''
'''Thengling''' is a name used in the [[Song of the Mounds of Mundburg]] poems
column2: used in reference to [[Théoden]]'s death at the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]]. It identifies Théoden by his father [[Thengel]]'s name with the diminuative ending 'ling' to denote him being Thengel's child.<ref>{{RK|V6}}</ref>
